```{r, message=FALSE}
# **************************************************************************** #
# ***************                Library                       *************** #
# **************************************************************************** #
library(keyringr)
library(tidyverse)
library(redcapAPI)
library(REDCapR)
library(dplyr)
library(plyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r, message=FALSE}
# Windows
 source("~/ehr-preeclampsia-model/code/utils/utils.R")
 source("~/ehr-preeclampsia-model/code/utils/params.R")
 api_token=get_API_token("redcap_ehr2")

# API and URL
uri='https://redcap.ctsi.ufl.edu/redcap/api/'
rcon <- redcapConnection(url=uri, token=api_token)

```

```{r, message=FALSE}

# maternal age

variables=c("part_id","perinatal_dx_date", "perinatal_dx_code", "perinatal_dx_descrip", "perinatal_dx_type", "perinatal_icd_code", "perinatal_dx_code_type")

# column types.
col_types <- readr::cols(
      part_id  = readr::col_character(),
      redcap_event_name = readr::col_factor(),
      redcap_repeat_instrument = readr::col_factor(),
      redcap_repeat_instance = readr::col_factor(),
      perinatal_dx_date = readr::col_date(),
      perinatal_dx_code	 = readr::col_factor(),
      perinatal_dx_descrip  = readr::col_character(),
      perinatal_dx_type = readr::col_factor(),
      perinatal_icd_code = readr::col_factor(),
      perinatal_dx_code_type = readr::col_factor()
     )

# participant records
records=mom_list

```

```{r, message=FALSE}

# pull data
start_time = Sys.time()
df=getData_redcap(api_token,uri,records,variables,col_types) %>%
  filter(redcap_repeat_instrument=="diagnosis_codes") %>% as_tibble() 
end_time = Sys.time()
end_time - start_time


```
```{r, message=FALSE}

# exploratory analysis

ggplot(df, aes(x = perinatal_dx_code)) +
  geom_bar()

```
